website_summaries.verdict: Many say this oversized inflatable mattress rivals their permanent bed for comfort. Built-in pump inflates and deflates quickly.
pros: Tall size makes it easy to get in and out
Features a built-in pump that inflates the mattress in just minutes
Top surface resists water and punctures
Flocked top is  comfortable and prevents sheets from slipping
cons: Occasional reports of losing air and inner chamber failure

customer_reviews.title: Self inflating, self deflating. Couldn’t be easier.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small one bedroom flat. My cousin and my 92 year old aunt came to stay last weekend. Bought your king size from Amazon two days before. Not at all sure, plugged it in and from there simply no problem so easy so comfy. They had two restful comfy nights sleep. 10/10 Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It randomly exploded in the middle of the night! Scary. Even more so after only 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Craig- Marta

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC AIR BED
customer_reviews.text: Having bought a sofa bed from a leading company (£1000), after two years it collapsed. It was bought for when my Son stops over. Having the bed repaired my Son will not sleep on it for fear of it collapsing again, so I purchased the Air Bed. Why oh why did I not get this in the first place. My Son had a good nights sleep and he said it was really comfy. My Son is 6' 7" and about 20 stone. The bed did not deflate. FANTASTIC. Definitely an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these, to help with the growing family visits. They have performed well so far and have been the best nights sleep on an air bed to date. They fold up well and after a few attemps you will make a better job of it. The storage bag supplied could in my opinion be sightly larger.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great value and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great value. This truly is very comfortable, we had family staying over for weekend and they loved it - would've happily slept on it myself. It's really quick to inflate and deflate. Word on sheet sizing, it's very deep (a good thing) so I bought a super king fitted sheet because I couldn't find any deep ones and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: H. Blythe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Highly reccomended!
customer_reviews.text: Its a fantastic air bed. Up in no time and de-flated in no time Easily fits one adults and 2 children. Nice and high like a proper bed - as compared to those low lying ones. Worth every bit of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jagtar Singh

customer_reviews.title: Just don't...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these horrid thing because of the amount of good reviews they had. Ours though was nothing of the sort. From the very first use, one of the long sides had been bulging up, causing discomfort to the person sleeping on that side. In later uses the bed needed increasingly frequent topping up until we had to do it every two hours or so. Not a great thing to do in the middle of the night because of the noise the pump produces and the obvious fact that I'd rather sleep than pump. All in all, this bed lasted about 9 uses in less than three weeks and caused us a lot of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have recurring fault.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first, extremely comfortable but after a year it started a recurring fault of developing holes on the bottom pocket indents. Only used on carpet but now evertime we repair it another one goes. Photo shows repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: After 5 uses it doesn’t hold the air in anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, the air pump is powerful and it would be an amazing product... if it worked. Would have returned it but unfortunately I started using it about a month after having bought it. After the 5th night it started deflating after a couple of hours. So unless you want to turn on a noisy pump in the middle of the night every 2 hours, look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Trejos

customer_reviews.title: Good for few weeks only
customer_reviews.text: Will not last more than a month :( Bought it for my friends that shown up whit unannounced visit :( was OK for first 7 days - after that small holes started to appear around so called "air coils". Patched 1st hole and next evening there was a hole on next "air spring" and so on... Every day you wake up on the floor with bad back :( every evening you will patch an old hole just ot wake up to a fresh one in the morning :( Very poor experience. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first time we used it, just leaks air after that. Don't do it. Delivery service was prompt, but I wouldn't recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: David Elf

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole. Used not even once
customer_reviews.text: As we insufflated it for the first time we heard air flowing out. It came with a hole in one side the size of my finger. Very disappointed. We tried to sort it out to at least spend the night, but the air did not stop leaking. A wate of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be useful if it wouldn't deflate overnight!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for about 2 weeks, and can say that it's a nice worked air mattress. Unfortunately, depending on how yous sleep on it, probably how much you weight as well, has an impact. I believe that for 2 persons of 11 stones (~70kg) this shouldn't pose a problem, and deflate, but it kinda did. I cannot say if it deflated by the same volume each night, and if you are not bothered by it, you can inflate it before bed in aprox 3minutes. I am ok with it, because it's the most durable I have owned and used, but could improve on stability (retain air?).
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Paul Ciobanita

customer_reviews.title: A Magic firm air mattress to have in the home
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and adding also with the super quick delivery ... well done guys
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Bought for spare room and havnt tried it yet but looks great and good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast. Bought for spare room and havnt tried it yet but looks great and good value. Update Have put air bed up to try. Son is now asleep on it having said he wouldn’t try it. That was before he saw it pumping up and realised the size and how comfi it is. Bit big for what I wanted at Christmas so have put in an order for a single after seeing how good this queens size one is. Very pleased indeed
customer_reviews.author: jacinth darch

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and air retains for a couple of days without having to pump again. However, battery started burning/smoking after 5 uses over the span of a few months, and no longer pumps air. Would not recommend for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: A simply superb inflatable bed!
customer_reviews.text: How can you "rave" about an inflatable bed? Strangely I do! I have told so many people just how good/comfortable this bed is. Being electric means that it is both simple to inflate AND (equally as important) deflate. We have had several guests come to stay who have all said that this is more comnfortable than their own bed at home!
customer_reviews.author: melmacboy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate, Firm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This airbed exceed my expectations. It was quick to inflate, inflates nice and firm, we actually had to let a little air out. I used it for a week's camping and am impressed. It keeps it's shape really well and you don't just roll into the middle and there is surprisingly little movement caused by your partners rolling around. The only thing which could be better is if it came with a bag, as it is a bit of a faff getting it back in the box
customer_reviews.author: mikedevill

customer_reviews.title: IT COULDN'T HAVE BEEN MORE COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC!!! IT WAS EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE, THE MATERIAL ON TOP OF THE BED STOPPED THE SHEET FROM SLIPPING OFF. IT WAS SO EASY TO BLOW UP AND DEFLATE. IT DOES EVERYTHING IT SAYS ON THE TIN!! LOVED IT! WE PURCHASED IT ON 10TH JUNE (AND SLEPT ON IT FOR 3 NIGHTS) FOR WHEN WE STAY AT MY PARENTS BECAUSE THEIR PUT-YOU-UP WAS SO UNCOMFORTABLE AND WE LOVED IT SO MUCH THAT WHEN WE GET OUR SPARE ROOM CLEARED AND MADE INTO A GYM WE'LL BE PURCHASING ANOTHER ONE FOR WHEN WE HAVE GUESTS.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t last two nights.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving two stars because it lasted two nights. The first night was fine, it’s easy to inflate and to be an air bed was comfortable. When I woke up I had to inflate it a bit but this was normal after one night. The second night I woke up con the floor. It was completely deflated and I couldn’t find the reason why because It was just one person (myself) 65 kg sleeping on it. Very disappointed because I was expecting to use it for longer than that. It’s not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Not sure.itable for camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go camping. Blew it up solid. By bedtime nearly half deflated didn't worry as you are warned it may need topped up. 're inflated bed. Went to bed ...bed slowly deflated within an hour....we both got out of bed ...pumped it up...by 3 a.m. I was lying on the cold lumpy ground with only pockets of air left in the bed.Got very little sleep! Next day..re inflated the bed..went out for walk etc.....came back and it had deflated by about a third...gave up! Bought a £7.50 blow up double mattress out of Tescos and slept uninterrupted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a house move, so that the bed could be packed. It is good enough for us to be using it 5 days after moving in. I have pumped it up each morning for about 20 seconds. It has kept its shape. It hasn't given any back pain and has remained comfortable. I weigh over 20st whilst my wife weighs about 8st. Both of us are very happy with the bed. In short it does the job it was meant to do and I would prefer it to a bed settee for a guest bedroom. It would never replace a good mattress but has been a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Walters

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option for a spare bed
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit I was a bit worried ordering it but I have to say it was a really good nights sleep. It blows up with its motor very quickly and is really quite high, pretty much like a standard bed. It’s nice and wide so my wife and I had lots of room. I suppose because if the tube design it didn’t sag in the centre as I’d been concerned about. My only criticism would be that the top surface isn’t really flat, there are large dimples where the tubes are so next time we’ll use a mattress topper to make it smoother. All in all it was a good buy and I’d recommend for a spare bed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Love

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is a good double/king size mattress with a flock top. This helps sheets to stop slipping. We used it for 4 nights camping last week and needed to add a top up of air each night, but the temperatures where variable and the company do advise that this may occur, especially in the first few uses due to stretch of material. It inflates quickly with the electric integral plug. It is very comfortable, ideal for visitors and camping, we are happy with the look, quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Austerfield

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for camping
customer_reviews.text: Having wanted to try a premium air bed for our camping holidays I decided to purchase 2 of these when they came in the lightning deal £52. We have just returned from a 3 night trip and have to say these beds are worth every penny they inflate effortlessly and also deflate with a push of a button. They generally are as big as my bed at home and can easily accommodate 2 adults. We'll worth the money, only bad thing I could say is that they don't come with a bag to store them in so I've had to purchase a holdall.
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, instant guest bed.
customer_reviews.text: Unfolded it, plugged it in, 3 minutes later had a 5 foot bed, high enough to feel like a normal bed :-) The bed was comfortable, needing a little more inflation after the first day. The only issue is finding bedding big enough to stay tucked underneath. A super king flat sheet worked but the fitted ones weren't long enough. After use, reversing the pump worked really well and the bed was folded back into its box 10 minutes later. Folding back up to fit the box is a bit of a challenge, and there is no bag provided, so the box is the only option. Once in the box it is small and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started to deflate after being used once
customer_reviews.text: This inflated perfectly and was very comfortable to sleep on the first time it was used. However, the second time we came to use it, inflated great again but then started to deflate during the night. This mattress was folded correctly after use and stored in the original box. So I am very disappointed with this given how expensive it was. The mattress was used on a rug so highly unlikely that anything punctured it. Perhaps a defect in the lining or sealing. I therefore can not recommend this product given it was used once and cost £80
customer_reviews.author: Joe Harding

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my adult daughter as she has been staying with us during this difficult time and we wanted to buy a bed that wold not break the bank that would be comfortable, easy to blow up and could be packed away without taking up too much room. Well this certainly fits the bill in every way. We can get this all set up and covered with bedding in a matter of minutes. She absolutely loves. Well worth the money too. Very prompt delivery and would certainly recommend and use this buyer again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jes

customer_reviews.title: Best inflatable bed you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price!! Great height like a normal box bed. The pillow top is wonderful, the feel of the bed is superb. Quick inflating, was probably a little more than 3 minutes (or I was just in a hurry) and deflating was the same. Folds easily, might just have to unfold and refold to get it right to fit back in the box. Power pump is integrated so it's just one whole unit with a pocket to hide the plug. All in all this is a great bed and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: The perfect air bed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant bed! Guests that stayed on it (both in their late 60s) said how comfortable it was. They said you would never tell it was an air bed. These people are always very blunt and say exactly what they think so I don't think they were trying to be polite! I have lay on it myself and it is comfortable although I haven't spent the night on it. Took about 5 minutes to inflate, about the same to deflate. Easy enough to fold back up but not to go back in the box. Will be getting a separate decorative box for it to live in though so not a major issue!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for #duvetknowitschristmas
customer_reviews.text: Served us very well over Christmas. 2 medium build adults no problems. The “pillow” is not adequate on its own. Does get cold even though it has a suede top but that may have been because it was not on a carpeted floor. Not noisy but obviously bouncy if your partner moves about in his/her sleep. Moved it fully inflated from room to garage over the 10 nights with no punctures. Dodgy electrical connection to the pump. Took me a couple of nights to get comfy on it and only inflated it once during the 10 nights it’s been up. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RWA5H

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money this item would not stay inflated you had to constantly keep turning the pump on every hour unable to find a air leak this was one of two that I had ordered second one after a day split on the top which you cant put a repair on I would not waste your time with them let me down when it was needed dont be called cheap rubbish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must if you camp
customer_reviews.text: We had to go camping when I was 30 weeks pregnant so needed a more comfortable airbed than our old, thin one. I must say, this mattress is incredible! I slept super comfortably despite having a bump and generally being quite uncomfortable. Even slept on it for a couple of nights at 36 weeks pregnant because we moved house and our new bed and mattress hand't arrived in time. It was still very comfortable. It's high enough so you can easily get up from it as well. And it inflates and deflates easily. I now recommend it to everyone for a more pleasant camping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect guest bed 🥰🥰
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a guest bed for our loft room , and this is just perfect ! Really easy to inflate & super quick too !! My sister & her partner who has back trouble stayed a few weeks ago, and he remarked that he had a surprisingly good nights sleep for a blow up bed !! We now have it permanently set up so we don’t yet know what it’s like to deflate ! Great product & value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for guests over Christmas, I tried it first and did find it deflated slightly the first night but since then it's been brilliant! We've now used it on quite a few occasions and everyone says how comfortable it is. Good size, blows up and deflates very easily. I use a topper underneath the sheet to make it a little softer but can't fault it. The folded down bed is a fair size and no way could we get it back into the box, but it stores into a reasonable space. No complaints here! Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Greeno

customer_reviews.title: Deflates too much overnight
customer_reviews.text: I have had this now for about 6 months and have used it about a handful of times. The first time I used it myself with my partner for about four days. Every night it deflated a lot but I chalked that up to stretching out as the directions noted. However the couple times I have had guests over and I pump it up myself to a nice solid level, I come in in the morning and it’s basically half deflated already! It’s so embarrassing. I cannot find or hear any holes. I may just give up and purchase an actual bed or sofa bed. Would not recommend for any purpose
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, does what it says on the box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my sons friend unexpectedly had to stay with us for a week and we had to put him up in the living room. It inflates and deflates in about 3-4 mins and according to him, is very comfortable. More comfortable than his bed, so much so that he has now bought one. Could not get it back in its original box (not really a big surprise there) but easily fits in a larger box we had so can be stored away easily. Did not deflate at all overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for those in need of a spare bed
customer_reviews.text: Very big, and very very comfortable! Pumps up in no longer than 3 minutes. Me and the misses slept on this for a few days to test it. Feels as if it goes down a tad. But that may be excess air that gradually leaves the mattress. But regardless. Its still very comfortable! There are alternatives that are practically the same at cosco for 40 quid, but i lacked a member ship, so went for this. Defo a good buy for those in need of a spare bed. It lifts quite high off the ground also!
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Mayne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, read on...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a king and got a small double (or large single). Constantly feels like its about to burst, incredibly uncomfortable and I ended up on the sofa (redecorating and our bed got damaged so needed something for a few days). Deflated within 24 hours of its first inflation even though we kept reinflating it. Alright if you want one rough nights sleep, provided both you and your partner are very short, skinny, and lightweight. Prepare to wake up on the floor because itll deflate in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish quality
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. This pricey air bed was used 3 times - and on the 3rd time we woke up almost to the floor so we had to turn on the pump in the middle of the night to inflate it. So frustrated. What’s even worse is that I missed the return window so this is just one big WASTE of money. For how expensive this item is, DO NOT BUY IT it’s not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought as we had a blow up bed which we used a manual pump for which is so tiring. Our cousins had a automatic inflate/deflate air mattress like this one, so we decided to buy also, as a friend was coming over and as drinks would be consumed did not want to manually blow up the air bed after a few. This worked very well and our friend advised it was comfortable, did not go down much during time on it. Just a bit fiddly to fold and get back in the box but still worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: whalepower

customer_reviews.title: Perfect guest bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my brother stays with me when he comes back from travelling the world for a while. The first night he was sinking into it but that was our fault for not inflating it enough and being overcausious. The mattress is a good size even for someone of over 6ft. Very easy to inflate and deflate but a little noisey so don't wait until too late if others are sleeping in the house. When you move there is a pop of each pocket that is filling back up which is a little annoying but that helps with the comfort of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Seems very stable compared to previous airbed
customer_reviews.text: I have only inflated at home so far to test, but this seems very stable for an airbed and is going to be a big improvement on our next camping trip. It is difficult to fold it back up again, given that it has a in built pump at one end. It would be better if this could be used via a car cigarette lighter socket, I'm going to use the manual port with my normal 12v pump when we are out camping.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really great mattress. I'm very pleased with this inflatable mattress. It is expensive but the quality and comfort make up for it. I use it as my everyday bed as I live in London and I don't wan't to have to take a proper mattess with me everytine I chamge house. Edit. They also offer amazing customer service! Karren really went out of her way to solve my issue! Thank you! Great company to Buy from
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Caddeo

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency/travel mattress
customer_reviews.text: A great self inflating mattress that gives firm comfort bust stows away in a small place. For a balanced review I will say the integrated mains lead could ideally be a little longer, but this would undoubtedly make the whole item much larger. The mattress comes with a very helpful instruction manual and information sheet, giving tips like the mattress will relax in its first few uses and may require extra inflation. The only addition I would add is maybe the support,lier could include a bag to stow the deflated item in, as deflating and trying to get it back into the box is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Y. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This bed has been a godsend. I was initially looking at fold up beds but I'm so glad I decided on this. It's easy to inflate and is so comfy. It's a bonus that it's high which makes it easy to get up from if you're not the most agile. We had a problem with the first one after a couple of weeks of use, didn't contact the seller immediately as we couldn't be without it. When I did get in touch after 4 or 5 weeks the seller replaced the bed immediately without any hassle. I have been very impressed with both the bed and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: samuel spaniel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of the Yawn because, despite the long advertising presentation for the latter on TV, that one didn't get great reviews like the Active Era Airbed did. We've only used it on two consecutive nights but it was great; inflated as quickly as promised & 4 of us were intrigued with the first inflation! We were a little chilly so I've bought a fleece under-blanket and I'm sure this will make it cosy. On the other hand, if using the Active Era in very hot weather the coolness of the airbed will probably be a very good thing.
customer_reviews.author: bearwoodbabe

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is brilliant, it does exactly what it says, inflates in 3 minutes, deflates in 3 minutes. I placed a mattress topper on top, and it is very comfortable, it takes up a lot of room, but folds away very neatly. I only use it occasionally for family stopovers. I’m glad I bought it, and I can’t praise it high enough. And at that price, it is a gift.
customer_reviews.author: beavo

customer_reviews.title: Highly pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Inflates and deflates quickly. Ive only used it once, me and my gf had a comfy nights sleep and there was plenty of space. It is made of good quality materials and feels sturdy. We didnt have to refill it and it was up for about 10 hours. Would not reccomend for camping as its quite bulky and heavy but its perfect when you sleep at relatives houses or for when you have guests over. Thanks to the seller :) good communication and delivery speed, even though its not delivered with Prime .
customer_reviews.author: BrentTheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Queen size Air Bed
customer_reviews.text: Queen size diubleAir Bed, ordered this and it was delivered next dat. We switched it on and inflated the bed, very comfortable. Had blow up beds in the past, and always end up with it deflating. Not this one, stayed at a reasonable level of fill. So say to add air with the built in pump. We found that possibly day 3 needs a small top up. It is a very comfortable air bed. Bought to help ease family visits, when extra space is needed. I have made a carry bag for it so easy to pick up and move around. I have no problem in recommending this air bed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 67

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quick and Strong Inflatable Bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed, very strong holds shape for the duration the entire night, self conpartised fan plug storage. The fan is loud (similar to a hoover) but it's only for few minutes till the bed is inflated and deflated. I've been use it everyday during the COVID lockdown and been having good joint free pain experience when waking up in the mornings. Definitely I will buy this bed again as it's a king size and foldable bed too.
customer_reviews.author: viqueens

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quick to inflate and deflate
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents to stay for a week. They say it's very comfortable and is quick to put up and take down. Overall very happy and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to inflate, just plug it in and it's ready in no time. Nobody has slept in it yet but I inflated it a few days ago ready for family that are visiting tomorrow. I will update my review depending on their comments . It seems sturdy enough. Update, my sister and her husband slept on it for five nights and said it was very comfortable. It was easy to deflate and have now put it away until next time we have visitors over.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised. I bought this because I'm moving house and the old bed had to go, so I wanted something temporary - just for a few weeks. Didn't expect to be so comfortable! It took 3 mins to inflate and it's perfect. I will happily use it as a guest bed in the future. COmes in a little bag so cuts down on removal costs and tidies away once my new bed arrives. My only negative is not the model or make at all, but just the fact that air beds are cold underneath you. I learnt the uncomfortable way, but next night had a blanket underneath me and am now snug. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant...
customer_reviews.text: Have seen a lot of bad reviews for Blow Up Beds, but decided after a bit of investigation to go for this one. I blew it up as soon as it arrived and kept topping it up for a few days whilst is settled down. Have just used it on a weekend camping trip and did not need to top it up at all over three days. It is very well made and designed, there is no sagging and rolling into the middle, just an amazingly comfortable good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bed
customer_reviews.text: We have only inflated this in our front room but we laid on it and it was very comfortable. We bought this to replace a faulty bestway queen size bed which was very comfortable and this is just as good if not a little more comfy. I like that the company are that confident this product will last that it comes with a 2 year warranty . Quick to inflate and easy to deflate . I would recommend this item and the customer service of the company is also very good. It is true to the sizing of a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: miss kerry norbury

customer_reviews.title: Airbed of your dreams
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product. This airbed is so easy to inflate and deflate, with no effort on my part. Once inflated it is more comfortable than my own bed. As it is not an airbed close to the floor, it looks just like a normal bed when bedding is put on it, and you don`t have to struggle to get on or off it. I was saving it for guests at my house, but I will be taking it with me to use if I stay over at any one else`s, as it so much better than any spare bed, put you up or guest bed I have been offered.
customer_reviews.author: June Clover

customer_reviews.title: and many friends that are also global so we needed something big enough but also comfortable and was not a major hassle to erect This ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I have family that live abroad ,and many friends that are also global so we needed something big enough but also comfortable and was not a major hassle to erect This was the perfect answer thank you only bought last week and already 4 people have slept on it and 2 are going to buy for on use 😊 So thank you for changing my people staying over life Minutes to effect and deflate thinking of getting a single also for the children Thank you a amazing product Georgina mears
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE -Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: My sister has borrowed this bed and has been using it for the past few weeks. She lives in Spain and is considering purchasing one to have there she was that impressed with it. The mattress never went down during her time using it but she does put a little more air in it every 3/4 days to ensure even support. With what she tells me I would recommend this without any hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Schirwing

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It is a good looking product, feels good quality. Easy to inflate and deflate. However, it was delivered without a closing plug where you would inflate it manually. We left our foot pump piece in so it would not deflate as we were camping.I have emailed the company 3 weeks ago to be sent the missing part with no answer so far. I would not recommend it’s purchase as it comes incomplete.
customer_reviews.author: Moustique

customer_reviews.title: Luxury - sheer luxury - for the best blow up bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to blow up. Bigger and better quality than our older blow up bed. Bought as a spare bed for house party, but is so comfortable was using downstairs when ill with flu. It's actually more comfortable than my own mattress!! And 4 month puppy likes it too! No sure how I'm going to persuade her that it's not her bed. ROFL Great customer support and on-going care advice. Can't say more than that.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable firm bed ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed to sleep downstairs to escape from our hot bedroom upstairs. We ordered two Queen size. It arrived quickly. The bed is very comfortable and we are having a very good nights' sleep so far (4 nights). The air in the bed has not gone down so far... bed is still firm. I highly recommend this bed. Only issue I had was that the promotional discount was offered only for buying a Queen size and a Single... not for two queen size :-( ...
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Inflates then deflates!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed for nearly three months. The overall build quality 'looks good'. The internal pump (inflate & deflate) works well, except that mine deflates by an unacceptable amount after a short time. This happens if I lay on it or not (it is not punctured). I am not sure if it has a faulty valve. I understand this issue is supposed to reduce after a short time... Well it has not so I will be requesting a refund. Sorry. I will report if the company give me the run-around!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Valentine Studio

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this purchase...the bed is surprisingly comfortable and supportive. Easy and quick to inflate/deflate. Also, my recent contact with the company has been very positive, they dealt with my queries in a very professional and efficient way. As a result of our experience with this King size version, we also have a need for two single beds, which we will be purchasing shortly. Overall, extremely pleased with our experience, happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Check size before ordering - it’s like the Titanic when inflated
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big bed. Not comfortable you need a topper I went for teddy topper king size. It does however inflate very quickly and I hope with the topper it will be comfortable. I’m not sure about sizes this is a queen king size which is confusing and the description is vague. I was going to return this because it’s not a clear description. I inflated it in my fathers house and it was like raising the Titanic! Massive. If you want something that sleeps a family this is for you. I wish the description was better. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Mead

customer_reviews.title: Great airbeds and idea just are a 'let down ' with to short a life span
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3weeks in a 4week holiday like other reviewers split in corner of one of the indents I stuck a repair patch which didn't really stick to the flock. Sent item back Come up with a genius idea brought 3 cheapo air beds for a tenner each put them on top of each other for the hight, 3 thin airbeds acted as one seemed to work OK and if 1 puctures or has slow leak dont end up sleeping on the floor and if unreapairable not to bad to throw away and replace 1 chepi air bed .think its the way I will go now
customer_reviews.author: mrs elaine smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and extremely fast to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: I love this inflatable mattress so much that I cannot recommend it highly enough. It goes up in 3 minutes and is so very comfortable to sleep on. Infact I love this mattress so much I intend on purchasing another one, so if you are looking for a quality made inflatable mattress this is the one in my humble opinion it's worth every penny. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Joanne.

customer_reviews.title: Air bed excellence
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to a replace an air bed we had had for 15 yrs, and I wish I had done it much sooner. This airbed is amazing it really does inflate / deflate in 3 minutes very easily and is super comfortable. We had friends to stay and they slept like babies so after they had left we chilled out on the airbed all day, would probably have kept it up permanently if we had the space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superbly comfortable well manufactured bed inflates very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this bed as my main bed at home permanently set up in the bedroom. I prefer an air bed to a conventional bed. The air springs make it superbly comfortable and stable for the differing body weights of my wife and self. It has not needed an air top up since I first set it up. It is a good height for getting in and out. We are a retired couple. The seams look strongly welded. In short, what is there not to like!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving Bed
customer_reviews.text: Had faily staying over for 7 Days, as I lived in a 2 Bedroom Flat the only other temporary available space was the Dining Room. Needed something that I could store away until required again. The inflateable bed was the only sensible solution. Ordered a King Size air bedwith with built in electric pumpand pillow. Very easy to operate and fairly quick to inflate. My guests were very comfortable . After their stay deflated bed and surprisingly fitted in a box appx 15"x15"x8" which I placed in my hall cupboard. Money (I felt) well spent. Would definately recommend. i must add very impressed with this company, received item within 3 days of placing order. Great service
customer_reviews.author: Chuck6

customer_reviews.title: Really high and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable. It didnt take a lot to inflate. Its the best thing to have the internal pump. It is really high like a real bed. I bought it for my 70 year old parents. I will still put a matteess topper to add a bit more comfort. I'm sure it'll be still very good without it. It'd have been nicer if it came with a storage bag. Once deflated, you will need a massive bag to fit it in.
customer_reviews.author: InciR

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a bed for occasional visitors. It hasn't been used as such yet, but I have unpacked it and inflated/deflated it to make sure everything worked. It appears very well made and inflates/deflates extremely fast, so the inbuilt pump does its job very well. I did lounge about on the inflated bed for a while to test comfort and it seemed pretty good to me. It's worth noting that it's usual for airbeds to react to ambient temperature and it does take a few uses before they take on their proper shape, so I imagine this one will react similarly. So far, so good though.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable air bed
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent queen sized air bed. It self inflates/deflates in a short period of time by simply plugging in the plug into the mains and turning the dial to 'inflate' or 'deflate' respectively, and the plug can tidily be stored inside a compartment at the end of the bed. It is a good height off the floor (much higher than simply putting a normal mattress on the floor), and is very comfortable to sleep on. I have spent multiple consecutive nights on this mattress with no issues whatsoever. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a high quality temporary bed or extra bed for when guests come round.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Was good, now slowly deflates!
customer_reviews.text: I have this bed for almost a year now. Purchsed for family to use last Christmas and have used it a total of approximately 9 times. Now by the time morning comes, it has half deflated and its only been 2 small kids sleeping on it! So disappointed 😞 If emailed the support, but no response over 2 weeks later! ☹
customer_reviews.author: CassieP

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!. I bought it to tie me over while moving home and what a great buy! it takes 3 /4 minutes to reach optimum size- it is noisy but it's well worth putting up with it for the most amazing sleep ever. it is of a suitable size for people like me, who have mobility problems, to sit and get up from. it is firm and does not loose shape. I have slept on it for 3 nights and still perfectly fine. I got the king size and its lush for a single person, would fill 2 big adults without problems. Cannot reccomend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Manuela

customer_reviews.title: Good for guests
customer_reviews.text: We needed a mattress for guests in the lounge as we are short of space in our bungalow. My experience of blow-ups is that they are flimsy, hard to inflate and small. This is so much better, a really good size, robust, easy to inflate and deflate. It hasn’t had rigorous testing yet but should be fine. We found it hard to get it as small as it came so it fits in the box, but there you are. It even has repair patches just in case. Really pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: PaulieB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for staycations or guest bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for the new 2020 staycation plan and I couldn’t be more pleased! It inflates and deflates with ease using the in-built pump but works just as well if you use a rechargeable pump depending on the facilities. Could be used as a guest bed because it is so quick to set up ready to use and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Really good size and easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: Really great air bed, our dog managed to sneak into our spare room and ruin a new mattress right before Christmas (ahhh) got this as an emergency measure and used it in 3 different locations over Christmas and twice since - no regrets with this purchase - so easy to inflate in under 5 minutes and easy to deflate. Noisy (if you are inflating at 2am on News Years Eve ) but would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sandyanne

customer_reviews.title: Badass
customer_reviews.text: My gf and I have been sleeping on it for literally 2 months. Just needs a 30 second refill a few hours before bedtime to spruce it up. I'm pretty sure this is an unreasonable use of the product but even so, it holds up like a champ. It's only gotten a bit bloated at the sides, which is absolutely fair given that it's made out of a plastic material under a continuous strain. Yet, the comfort and support remain fabulous. In case anyone's wondering if it can take a 2 month long beating, it sure can, and counting. And again, this is two people on it. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rafa Novo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to inflate and deflate
customer_reviews.text: Bed inflated really quickly and controls easy to use. The bed was really comfortable and was extremely spacious for two people. I use a super king bottom sheet which covers the base nicely and doesn’t slip due to the flock surface. Deflating was as easy as inflating and although I couldn’t fold it as small as when it arrived, it does fold back up reasonably easily. Very good value for money and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: This literally does what it says on the description, plugs in and inflates in minutes. Very comfortable for adults and children. Bought a king size and fits 2 adults comfortably. Blew up and stayed up for at least the 5 nights we had it out for. Good height for the older users. Very happy and came before expected date (also included strong box to keep stored, instructions and if needed patches for punctures.) Very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a bed for occasional visitors. Two people have slept on it since I bought it and they both said it was comfortable. Inflated easily and doesn't seem to have lost any air over a period of some 4 days. The integrated pillow seems a bit low but it stops normal pillows sliding off the end, so quite an useful addition. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ian P.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive comfortable bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed bought for friend that were coming over to visit us in our house. We wanted to offer them best comfort but having a portable bed that we could store when not in use. Very handy airbed with inbuilt pump. It takes 3min to have the bed fully ready. Our friend said that they were very comfortable and they felt as comfortable as a normal bed. Only to add that every night it will require a bit re-pumping to keep it hard and comfy. You will not wake up with bed deflated because it keeps the air overnight very well. Used several times and no leaks detected, very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spare bed
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 2 weeks now, I wanted to wait because I've used it everyday during the 2 weeks. Glad to say I've had no problems, inflates and deflates easily in a few minutes. Comfort is fine obviously not as firm as a real mattress but perfectly adequate , only downside is a lack of storage bag . Luckily I had a spare which makes putting away and storage much easier. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Really quick and easy to inflate, and deflate. Feels potentially comfy to sleep on so fingers crossed. May have to watch my calorie intake over Christmas as don’t want to launch the other half off in to the back of beyond when I get into/onto air bed😉 Did take one star off merely because the box could be slightly bigger- once deflated it’s like trying to wrestle an ugly sister’s foot into a glass slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Hexy

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so comfy, bought it for camping and only had to top it up once (it tells you that though in the box) I know people say it's cold using airbeds whilst camping and I do agree but we use electric blankets. Fitted sheets stayed in place too. Really quick to inflate and when deflating I kept turning it back on to whilst folding it to get it back into the box. Only downside is it doesn't come with a bag to store it like some others do!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate/deflate, so comfy
customer_reviews.text: We have only currently taken this bed out of the box and blew it up as a tester before we go camping, the height is great and easy to get up from (we did lay down on it to test it), it also inflated in around 3 minutes. The only thing to be improved would be if this came with a carry bag or the option to buy one as the box was damaged when recieved from amazon and so we have needed to find a bag for this. Overall a great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ka H

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Bed
customer_reviews.text: AS an inflatable i recommend this bed up and ready in a few mins and down and away just as easily and quickly and made from good strong material i used it as a start up cheap bed as i moved into my new place and am just going to continue using it as it just as good a regular bed well done and good quality guys
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: So far so excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping, arrived quickly and was eager to set it up. Plugged in and turned on, bed inflated quickly and was comfortable, much better than others I have bought. Left it up for an hour and all seemed well. Need a couple more shake downs before I say to much but it’s hard to do proper tests as it’s difficult with a 3 yo son thinking it’s a bouncey castle!! May have to have a camp out in the living room with him to test it properly soon, but Cornwall is booked for later in the year so watch this space.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress which feels like a regular mattress.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very comfortable air mattress, and my guests loved it. One end of the mattress is a bit raised which can also act as the pillow. The width of the mattress is substantial and anyone looking to buy should make a not of it. The included electric pump can be used to quickly inflate and deflate it. Point to note if you are using the electric pump to deflate make sure the air lock is closed. It's a heavy mattress and would have loved if the company would have provided a storage bag for the same. Also some sort of guidance on how to fold it easily would have been super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: After several uses now the mattress is starting to deflate more and more throughout the night. Easy to inflate and deflate but the bump for the head is quite uncomfortable wish it didn't have that feature and was flat instead. Folding it is a nightmare, wish it had a fabric storage bag like other mattresses do. It's ok for a short use.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect emergency bed
customer_reviews.text: I can't fault this product. We moved into our new house about 3 months ago and bought this for guests but due to my wife's insane snoring and my ridiculously early morning starts, I've slept on it more then i have in my own bed. It's been inflated now for about 2 and a half months without deflation and i only need to give it a quick 30 second top up once a week (if that).
customer_reviews.author: Jim Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Could not recommend this airbed enough! One of the best things I've ever bought. The quality of the product is outstanding; super comfortable, thick and tall, easy to blow up and deflate, does not deflate when sleeping on at all. I spent a lot of money buying cheap ones that I was throwing away after 1 or 2 uses, but this one is to keep for a very long time. My friends love it when they stay over and say it's more comfortable than their own bed. If you're tired of buying cheap airbeds, definatly worth spending a bit more money for this! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Bee

customer_reviews.title: The best air bed out there !!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the inflatable air beds we have ever used ! It has a built in air pump with a normal 13amp plug that stores away inside the pump. Simply switch it to inflate for one of the most comfortable and supportive air beds on the market - there is no sagging in the center like most air beds thanks to its integral support columns which gives it a uniform stable and comfortable surface. Then once your done switch to deflate to make packing it away a doddle . We used this bed for camping and would highly recommend it as it felt like our real bed at home , Five stars most impressed
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic company and a most comfortable luxury Air bed.
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this air bed, it is extremely comfortable and so easy to inflate, deflate and store when not in use. It’s also very well made and appears to be very durable. In addition to the above we are also very impressed with the One Retail Group who really take an interest in after sales support and have provided additional information to keep the Air bed in tip top condition. To summarise I would have no hesitation in recommending both the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good but some improvements could make this AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Used it for 6nights so far. Very comfortable, easy to inflate and being 6ft 3" the king size bed is perfect with only slight over hang of my feet due to long legs. Dislikes: it doesn't come with a bag. Would be great if it came with a bag to keep it all compact when not in use. The cable could be longer and the compartment that houses the plug and cable could be big to make packing this away a little easier. For example, the cable could be auto retractable like some vacuum hoovers. With the plug slotting inside a empty 3pin socket for tidiness.
customer_reviews.author: Craig D.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: First time i used this was great, second time after use in the morning the bed was half deflated. I bought this for my brother as he travells from kuwait once a year and lives at my place on holiday. The quality is very poor however lookwise and size is very good. The first night when bed was fine my brother said its very comfortable to sleep in. Sadly since then when he sleeps on it in the morning he wakes up to a half deflated bed
customer_reviews.author: fathema

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: A very good product, so easy to use. It inflates and deflates quickly using the integral pump. A 6ft 2in man slept comfortably on this queen size bed for a few nights. He did, however mention that the surface of the mattress was cold and he needed a blanket underneath the sheet. That was easily fixed and all in all we feel it is a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. A. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control department exist?
customer_reviews.text: Looks a great product. First use though, totally deflated in the night. Totally flat. I tried to inflate it again a few times however after waking up in the floor every 1-2 hours I slept on the sofa as needed to eventually sleep. Also when packing it away the choice to not supply a travel bag and just the box it comes in is also a very poor idea indeed. After no sleep, trying to get that to fit back into the box was a really kick in the teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it said on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased, arrived promptly, worked out of the box. It cannot be re-boxed, but we found a bag we get when getting our duvets dry cleaned worked a treat. It inflated to a sturdy level in about 3 minutes. Queen Size is a misleading description - it is close to King Size when inflated - just what we wanted. It did deflate slightly overnight but they say this is due to "stretching" and is to be expected for a short while. Deflation is quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Morris

product_meta.title: Active Era Queen Air Mattress with Built in Pump & Raised Pillow – Puncture Resistant with Waterproof Flocked Top, Elevated Inflatable Air Bed for Guests
product_meta.description:
Overview:

This Premium King Size Air Bed from Active Era® (The Body Source) is made with an ultra-high quality, hard-wearing puncture resistant-material. A powerful and easy-to-use electric pump (mains powered) is integrated into the blow up bed to allow full inflation in just 3 minutes, with an additional deflation setting so air can be removed to reduce storage size when not in use. A manual air-valve has also been fitted should you wish to inflate or deflate the air bed without the included pump.

The built-in raised pillow provides added neck and head support for a great night's sleep, and the airbed has been covered with a soft-touch waterproof flock making it perfect for use both at home or when camping. The King size mattress has also been designed with structured air coil technology that allows for an even distribution of weight for use by individuals, adults and couples.

 Features: 

- King size
- Powerful built-in electric pump
- Integrated raised pillow
- Soft-touch waterproof flock coating
- 15 Gauge puncture resistant material 
- 35 structured air coils for support
- Manual air valve fitted for flexibility 
- Puncture repair kit included

Specifications:

- Size: 203 x 152 x 48cm
- Power: 220V-240V, 50Hz
feature_bullets: BUILT-IN ELECTRIC PUMP: Integrated easy-to-use electric pump fully inflates the air mattress to firmness in 3 minutes (mains powered)
INTEGRATED PILLOW - Ergonomically designed raised-pillow provides head and neck support with bed-like comfort for a great night's sleep
FULL-BODY SUPPORT: This blow up bed is fitted with 35 structured air-coils to provide maximum support for your body, neck and spine
DURABLE DESIGN: Built with an extra thick, hard wearing and waterproof flocked top layer that has been designed with a 5 gauge puncture-resistant material
LARGE KING SIZE: (Large queen) with inflated dimensions of 152 x 203 x 48cm. CE Approved

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
